What is Engineering?

Explore More

An integral part of the history of human civilization, engineering has existed since ancient times. It contributed to the development of societies by utilizing scientific principles to design and build structures, devices, machines, tools, systems, processes and more. Engineering can simply be defined as the art of applying scientific methods and experiences to improve the lives of human beings. Engineering encompasses many disciplines, each focusing on a specific area of applied mathematics or applied sciences. The Egyptian Pyramids, the Eiffel Tower, computers, mobile devices, jet planes, and space shuttles, all stand as evidence that we live in a world that depends on engineering in all its aspects.
